sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"相信，信任"之意。
means: believe ： 普通用词，常表示一种缓和、不太肯定的口气。
trust ： 指绝对相信或信赖某人。
confide ： 侧重忠诚可靠与可信赖。
rely ： 指在相信的基础上可进一步依靠，着重可靠性。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词后跟on(upon)，均有"依赖，依靠"之意。
means: depend ： 侧重指因自身能力不足或缺乏自信心而依靠他人或物给予帮助或支持。
rely ： 通常包含着以前的经验证明对方是能依赖的意思。

sentence.Network_en: He can rely on my support when the crunch comes.
sentence.Network_cn: 关键时刻，他可以依靠我的支持。

sentence.Network_en: Most poultry farmers have to rely on commercially manufactured feeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 多数饲养家禽的农场主不得不依赖商业化生产的饲料。

sentence.Network_en: I know I can rely on you to sort it out.
sentence.Network_cn: 我相信你会把它解决好的。

list.abs: 从他的业绩看，他一定会升任组长。rely on 依赖；凭借这是一个双字动词，即动词与介词必须合用，才算正确用法。"rely"，依靠，信赖；介词"on"之后的受.
金榜起名网 - 何依雯 ... (8)依靠;托身[ depend on] (10)倚仗,仗恃,仰赖[ rely on] (12)同本义[ lean on].
投影差 height displacement投影差 relied displacement投影方程 projection equation

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French relier 'bind together', from Latin religare, from re- (expressing intensive force) + ligare 'bind'. The original sense was 'gather together', later 'turn to, associate with', whence 'depend upon with confidence'

entry.def: If you rely on someone or something, you need them and depend on them in order to live or work properly.

example.ex: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers...
example.tran: 他们非常依赖职业咨询师提供的建议。

example.ex: The Association relies on member subscriptions for most of its income.
example.tran: 这个协会的收入大部分来自会员的入会费。

entry.def: If you can rely on someone to work well or to behave as you want them to, you can trust them to do this.

example.ex: I know I can rely on you to sort it out...
example.tran: 我相信你会把它解决好的。

example.ex: The Red Cross are relying on us.

auth_sentence.content: Most surfers rely on dial-up connections and cyber cafes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most surfers rely on dial-up connections and cyber cafes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most surfers rely on dial-up connections and cyber cafes.

auth_sentence.content: We can't just rely on decarbonising the supply.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can't just rely on decarbonising the supply.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can't just rely on decarbonising the supply.

auth_sentence.content: Both opinions rely on hearsay, it would seem.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both opinions rely on hearsay, it would seem.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both opinions rely on hearsay, it would seem.

al向+ly=li联合→n.同盟国,同盟者;支持者 v.[with]使结盟

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依赖, 依靠, 信赖, 信任, 依赖于
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再次+ly=li捆绑,联合,约束→可以再次联合→信赖

Sentence.sentence: Why does America rely heavily on oil imports?
There is no question that the United States imports a great deal of energy and, in fact, relies on that steady flow to maintain its economy.

If you believe that you have found true romance, and your culture tells you that this is what a long-term relationship should be based on, there is less need to rely on social or family pressures to keep couples together, O'Sullivan argues.
Collectively, we rely on the unemployment figures and other statistics to frame our sense of reality.
Rather than relying on how others classify you, consider how you identify yourself.
They don't rely on their children to support them in old age.

means.word_mean: 信任; 信赖; 依赖, 依靠

sentences.en: You can rely upon Jacelin.
sentences.cn: 你可以信赖杰斯林。

sentences.en: You can always rely on Jim, he won't fail you.
sentences.cn: 你可以永远信任吉姆, 他不会让你失望的。

sentences.en: You can rely on me for help.
sentences.cn: 你可指望我来帮忙。

sentences.en: You may rely upon my early arrival.
sentences.cn: 你放心好了, 我会早到的。

sentences.en: You may rely upon his words absolutely, for he always speaks the truth.
sentences.cn: 你可以绝对信赖他的话, 因为他总是说老实话。

sentences.en: You can't rely on the weather.
sentences.cn: 天气是靠不住的。

sentences.en: You should rely on your own efforts.
sentences.cn: 你应该靠自己的努力。

sentences.en: I relied on the map but it was wrong.
sentences.cn: 我依靠这张地图, 但它是错的。

sentences.en: I'd like to come with you but that's not a promise, don't rely on it.
sentences.cn: 我愿意和你一起去, 但这不是允诺, 别指望我一定去。

sentences.en: The town relies on the seasonal tourist industry for jobs.
sentences.cn: 这个城镇全靠季节性的旅游业提供就业机会。

sentences.en: Hong Kong's prosperity relies heavily on mainland.
sentences.cn: 香港的繁荣在很大程度上依赖于大陆。

sentences.en: This young man cannot be relied on.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人不可靠。

sentences.en: He had proved that he could be relied on in a crisis.
sentences.cn: 他已表明, 在紧要关头他是可以信赖的。

sentences.en: He can always be relied upon for help.
sentences.cn: 他的帮助总是靠得住的。

sentences.en: We know such people are not to be relied upon.
sentences.cn: 我们知道这种人是靠不住的。

sentences.en: This story cannot be relied upon.
sentences.cn: 这话可靠不住。

sentences.en: Don't rely on going abroad for our holiday, we may not be able to afford it.
sentences.cn: 不要指望去国外度假, 我们可能负担不起费用。

sentences.en: Don't rely on going to Japan.
sentences.cn: 别指望能去日本。

sentences.en: We rely on his finishing the work today.
sentences.cn: 我们信赖他今天能完工。

sentences.en: Don't rely on me going to Japan.
sentences.cn: 别指望我去日本。

sentences.en: I rely upon you to finish the work on time.
sentences.cn: 我相信你会准时完成这项工作的。

sentences.en: We can rely on our children to do such work.
sentences.cn: 这样的工作我们可以放心地让孩子们去做。

sentences.en: They cannot be relied on to offer much support or advice.
sentences.cn: 不能指望他们提供很多支持和意见。
